Solutions

- [Likert Scale\\
\\
Complete Likert Scale Questions, Examples and Surveys for 5, 7 and 9 point scales. Learn everything about Likert Scale with corresponding example for each question and survey demonstrations.](https://www.questionpro.com/article/likert-scale-survey-questions.html)
- [Conjoint Analysis](https://www.questionpro.com/blog/what-is-conjoint-analysis/)
- [Net Promoter Score (NPS)\\
Learn everything about Net Promoter Score (NPS) and the Net Promoter Question. Get a clear view on the universal Net Promoter Score Formula, how to undertake Net Promoter Score Calculation followed by a simple Net Promoter Score Example.](https://www.questionpro.com/features/net-promoter-score.html)
- [Offline Surveys](https://www.questionpro.com/mobile/offline.html)
- [Customer Satisfaction Surveys](https://www.questionpro.com/survey-templates/customer-satisfaction-surveys/)
- [Employee Survey Software\\
\\
Employee survey software & tool to create, send and analyze employee surveys. Get real-time analysis for employee satisfaction, engagement, work culture and map your employee experience from onboarding to exit!](https://www.questionpro.com/employee-survey-software.html)
- [Market Research Survey Software\\
\\
Real-time, automated and advanced market research survey software & tool to create surveys, collect data and analyze results for actionable market insights.](https://www.questionpro.com/market-research-survey-software.html)
- [GDPR & EU Compliance](https://www.questionpro.com/gdpr/)

metadata.ogTitle: Survey Software - Online Survey Software - Customer Satisfaction Surveys - Employee Survey - Web Survey Software

survey_basics.title: QuestionPro
survey_basics.purpose: To provide survey software and research tools for various industries and use cases.
survey_basics.description: QuestionPro offers a suite of tools for creating and analyzing surveys, catering to various industries and use cases.
survey_basics.target_audience: Businesses, researchers, and individuals looking for survey solutions.
survey_basics.target_industry: Various including Gaming, Automotive, Education, Healthcare, etc.

sections.section_description: Overview of products offered by QuestionPro.
Resources available for users including blogs, eBooks, and templates.
Information about the company and its awards.

ux_best_practices.description: Ensure the survey interface is intuitive and easy to navigate.
ux_best_practices.implementation: Use clear labels and logical flow.

ux_best_practices.description: Design surveys to be responsive and accessible on mobile devices.
ux_best_practices.implementation: Test surveys on various screen sizes.
